name: DragonsHeaven DXH Style
description: ZeroENH enhancement profile for the dxh style — a Moebius-inspired, cel-animation aesthetic featuring organic-mechanical hybrid world-building, post-apocalyptic environments, and expressive hand-inked linework. Based on the DragonsHeaven image prompt enhancement system. Always opens with 'dxh style,' and closes with evocative mood language.
